dmca.title: Copyright Violation [www.fonts101.com]
dmca.body:
Please process the below dmca complaint. Thanks.

 

 

-----Original Message-----

From: Tim Starback [mailto:tstarback@emigre.com] 

Sent: Tuesday, April 10, 2007 9:49 AM

To: Copyright

Cc: legal

Subject: Copyright Violation [www.fonts101.com]

 

As per Title 17 USC 512(c)(3)(A) as amended 10/28/98 [Public Law  

105-304(HR 2281] this will serve as formal notification of copyright  

violation on your web server.

 

Dear ISP,

 

I am an employee of Emigre Graphics and am duly authorized to act on  

its behalf in the protection of its copyrighted software programs. In  

the performance of my duties, I have discovered certain unauthorized  

uses of copyrighted material belonging to Emigre Graphics posted to  

your web site by one of your subscribers.

 

The following copyrighted software was discovered:

Dogma (Copyright #: TX 4-347-115)

 

 

I have a good faith belief that the use of the material in the manner  

complained of is not authorized by Emigre, its agent, or the law.

 

That the information sought through the use of a subpoena, which  

seeks the identity of the person who uploaded the file at:

http://www.fonts101.com/xt_fontdetails_az_FID! 

19573~DogmaScriptBold~font.htm

 

 

This information will be used for the sole purpose of protecting the  

exclusive copyright interests of Emigre Graphics.

 

Please email me the name and address the subpoena should be mailed to.

 

I declare under penalty of perjury under the laws of the Untied  

States of America upon information and belief that the foregoing is  

true and correct to the best of my knowledge.

 

You can contact me at:

Emigre Inc.

1700 Shattuck Ave., #307

Berkeley, CA 94709

530-756-2900

530-756-1300 Fax

tstarback@emigre.com

 

Executed Tuesday, the 10th, of April 2007 in Davis California.

 

Regards,

Tim Starback

 

 

File Location:

http://www.fonts101.com/xt_fontdetails_az_FID! 

19573~DogmaScriptBold~font.htm

 

 

 

-- 

Emigre Inc.

1700 Shattuck Ave., #307

Berkeley, CA 94709

530-756-2900

530-756-1300 Fax

www.emigre.com

1700 Shattuck Ave # 307

Berkeley, CA 94709
